## ResourceType.getDefaultTemplateCandidate() method

Gets the default template value for this resource type. Subclasses should override this to provide type-specific default values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDefaultTemplateCandidate(json?: JsonValue, conditions?: ResourceJson.Json.ConditionSetDecl, __resolver?: IResourceResolver): Result<ResourceJson.Json.IChildResourceCandidateDecl>;
```

Result&lt;[ResourceJson.Json.IChildResourceCandidateDecl](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ichildresourcecandidatedecl.md)<!-- -->&gt;
